field.name: HeapRemaining
field.description: Unused memory on the normal heap (since boot).

field.name: FastHeapRemaining
field.description: Unused memory on the "fast" heap (located in core-coupled memory).

field.name: IRQStackRemaining
field.description: Unused space on the IRQ stack since boot.

field.name: CPULoad
field.description: Indicative measure of current CPU load.

field.name: EventSystemWarningID
field.description: ID of the last object to cause an event system warning.

field.name: ObjectManagerCallbackID
field.description: ID of the last object to cause an object manager callback warning.

field.name: ObjectManagerQueueID
field.description: ID of the last object to cause an object manager queue overflow.
